title: Is a scientific career, specifically life science still a good idea? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, it is! Especially Life Science(LS) it’s a field full of mysteries and possibilities. I’m not allowed to say too much out of personal experience, but what if I told you that current collagen is made out of animal skins, while it is possible to create this through a yeast! yes it’s true, the product won from the yeast is the basis for collagen and can be used for nearly every medical or pharmaceutical idea! But I got to stop here, before I say something stupid, this link is the best I can do.

It depends, what type of job you want, in heath care and clinical trial companies there are opportunities with better package. If you want to be become a scientist (Government) there is lots of competition. now if we talk about work satisfaction in life science, it is best experience.
